DOC.brief_title: Validation Neurokeeper 's Algorithm Patients Undergoing Cardiac Surgery .
DOC.criteria: Age > 18 year old . Patients undergoing cardiac surgery . Previous major hemispheric stroke . Any known major hemispheric lesion . Significant movement disorder . Local skull skin affliction prevents electrodes application . Any known condition opinion investigator may interfere protocol implementation .
